title: Using PHP Enums in Query buider
body:
<!--
Please use this issue tracker for bugs and feature requests only. In case you need support please use one of
Yii communities listed at https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/wiki/communities
-->

### What steps will reproduce the problem?
Using PHP Enums in query builder.
where I have this enum and this model, and I want to filter the model using the Enum value.
Enum.

```php
enum ProductsStatusEnum: int
{
    case ACTIVE = 1;
    case INACTIVE = 0;
}

class Products extents ActiveRecord
{
    public $status;
}


class ProductsController extends RestController 
{
    public function actionIndex()
    {
        return Products::find()->where(['status' => ProductsStatusEnum::ACTIVE])->all();
    }
}

```


### What is the expected result?
The data should be filters based on the enum value without braking.

### What do you get instead?
thows an error
I will get this error
```
Error: Object of class common\enums\ProductsStatusEnum could not be converted to string in /app/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/Command.php:329
```
